title: Nice newly upgraded 2 bedroom apartment
posting_body: ['This newly upgraded apartment is exceptionally nice.', 'It is located on the 2nd floor of a beautifully landscaped 2 flat building.', ' It is located in West Humboldt at 4321 w. Cortez.', ' The apartment has spacious Living room, Dining room, Kitchen, and 2 bedrooms and bathroom.', ' It also has a nice sized Patio/Deck.', ' Newly restored hard wood flooring.', 'Appliances Monthly rent is $1,450.00.', ' If interested, you can call or text Mr. Henry at 773 620-1241.']
